properties.entry: select content_no , round((concert_max - concert_seats)/concert_max * 100,1) as tbConRate , content_type , content_title , content_chimg , content_imgpath from contents join concert using (content_no) where content_type = '콘서트' and ROWNUM = 1 order by (concert_max - concert_seats)/concert_max * 100 DESC

select content_no , tbPlayRate , content_type , content_title , content_chimg , content_imgpath from (select AVG(rate) as tbPlayRate, content_no from (select content_no , round((round_max - round_seats)/round_max * 100, 1) as rate from round order by content_no , round((round_max - round_seats)/round_max * 100, 1) ) group by content_no) join contents using (content_no) where ROWNUM = 1 order by tbPlayRate DESC

select content_no , tbExTicket , content_type , content_title , content_chimg , content_imgpath from ( select content_no, avg(ticket_num) as tbExTicket from reservation_payment where content_type = '전시' group by content_no order by tbExTicket DESC ) join contents using (content_no) where ROWNUM = 1

select * from (select content_no , content_type , content_title , content_chimg , content_imgpath , concert_date from contents join concert using (content_no) where concert_date > SYSDATE order by concert_date) where ROWNUM = 1 union select * from (select content_no , content_type , content_title , content_chimg , content_imgpath , play_start from contents join play using (content_no) where play_start > SYSDATE order by play_start) where ROWNUM = 1 union select * from (select content_no , content_type , content_title , content_chimg , content_imgpath , exhibition_start from contents join exhibiton using (content_no) where exhibition_start > SYSDATE order by exhibition_start) where ROWNUM = 1
